## Type of change

- [ ] **New endpoint** â€” I added a new JSON file under `endpoints/`
- [ ] **Updated/funny content** â€” I added or improved jokes, variations, or examples in existing endpoints
- [ ] **Code change** â€” Bug fix, refactor, or other code-only change

## Checklist

- [ ] I've read and followed [CONTRIBUTING.md](../CONTRIBUTING.md)
- [ ] Code/style: `npm run lint` and `npm run format:check` pass (or I ran `npm run format`)
- [ ] If I added/changed endpoints: I ran `npm run validate` and `npm run generate`
- [ ] I added or updated tests where needed
- [ ] I updated docs if needed
- [ ] All tests pass (`npm test`)
- [ ] This PR is ready for review (and hopefully a chuckle)
